%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Stone Skin
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You get 25% melee damage protection upon equipping the artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receiving melee damage grants you Stone skin stack.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With receiving stack you get additional 15% melee damage protection but receive 10% speed penalty.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each stack grows protection with diminishing returns and penalize speed more.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Maximum 10 stacks is possible, at which you receive 85% reduction of melee damage but become completely immobilized.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 10 seconds, after which all stacks are burned.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Multiple artefacts increase the rate of gaining stacks.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Disintegrator
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Disintegrates part of the bullet coming to you. Unfortunately in the process a lot of radiation is emitted, making you ill.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reduces bullet damage by 15%.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Reduced amount of damage is converted to radiation.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts with diminishing returns. (max 65%)
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]SPECIAL ABILITY: %c[d_orange]Disintegration Field
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Throw the artefact to spawn a Disintegraiton Protection Field.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Disintegration Field reduces bullet damage by 60-100% in its vicinity with small radiation penalty.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The field lasts 1 minute. 
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Move the artefact to grenade slot manually or Right Click-Engage on it and then throw it like a grenade. 
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The artefact is consumed upon use.
%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Letyshops Time\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Receive 8% cashback on each buy.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Critical Ascensi0n
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Consecutive hits give 5% bonus to damage of your next shot.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Critical hits (headshots) give 15% bonus.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores psy-health on each hit with amount depending on stacks.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Missing the shot resets the bonus stack and gives psy damage penalty proportional to the stack you had.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Bonus can be stacked infinitely as long as you don't miss.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Unequipping all Spike artefacts will remove the stacks without penalties.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Light of Tranquility
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Greatly restores health and psy while being near campfire.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Amplifies psy recovery artefacts near campfire.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives up to 5 minutes of passive health and psy regeneration after sitting near campfire.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Minor Laceration
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Your weapon loses 50% of raw power but gains the ability to deal bleeding damage.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]With each hit the enemy will receive a bleeding stack and start to slowly lose health proportionally to weapon raw power.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]NPCs will panic in agony and pain, making them run sporadically.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]NPCs will have more chance to fall in wounded state, where they beg for mercy and might give you valuable information, if you reach them before they die.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Zone Alchemy
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Allows to transmutate artefacts.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Artefacts can be "upgraded" i.e. changed to a better tier (Night Star -> Gravi -> Gold Fish), or can be "mutated" i.e. changed to different type retaining same tier (Night Star -> Stone Blood -> Jellyfish)
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Top tier artefacts can only be mutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Perk artefacts can only be mutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Unique artefacts, including Bat itself, can't be transmutated.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each transmutation will cost you one Bat artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Right click-Transmutate on an artefact to perform transmutation.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Solar Powered
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives health and stamina boost at clear weather and little stamina boost at partly clear from 5 to 21 o'clock.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]At other time or weather conditions gives stamina penalty.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Will to Live
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives stronger health regen the less health you have, beginning with 30%.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]If the health is below 30%, you receive up to 50% less damage depending on how low health you are.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More artefacts increase the regen, upper health threshold for effect to start by 3% and max damage protection by 10%.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]The Weight Of Devotion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides small health and stamina regen.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Members of Sin quadruple the effect of the artefact and add psy regen.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Sin companions receive health regen one by one, starting from the one with the lowest health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Arszi's Blessing\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Converts radiation illness to stamina boost and gives light radiation cure.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]The Unorthodox Way Of Travelling
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Killing anyone will teleport you to the place of your victim's death.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The time is briefly slowed down upon the teleportation.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stuns NPCs in the small vicinity of the teleportation destination.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Don't try this on crows.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 30 seconds.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]SPECIAL ABILITY: %c[d_orange]Custom Teleport
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Right Click-Engage on the artefact to choose the custom point to teleport.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Due to Pauli Exclusion Principle, no two entities can be at the same place at the same time.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The artefact is consumed upon use.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Press Escape to cancel the teleportation.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Deal with the Devil
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gamechanger Artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Moving the artefact to belt will sign the Pact with the Zone.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The Zone empowers your Knot and it becomes the mysterious artefact also known as Lucifer.
 
 Saving the game is highly recommended before activation

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]That Insane Stalker from the Freedom faction
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Provides major psy resistance.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains psy health to restore health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]When health is full, restores psy health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]There is a chance that you perform one of crazy uncontrollable actions.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The lower the psy health, the higher the chance and severity of action.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Zone Infusion
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping into anomaly of various types infuses your active weapon.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Infused weapon loses 30% of its raw power but gains 70% of elemental damage power according to the anomaly type.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Only electric, thermal and chemical anomalies are valid for infusion.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 3 minutes, the artefact must be equipped for the effect to work.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]SPECIAL ABILITY: %c[d_orange]Infused Weaponry
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Drag and drop the artefact onto the weapon in the inventory to infuse it directly with random effect.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The effect will last 10 minutes.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The artefact is consumed upon use.
%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]What Colour Is Your Blood?\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Drains satiety to cure bleeding.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Dodge This
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has 25% chance to reflect 35% of bullet damage back.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Nullifies the damage of hit on reflection.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts with diminishing returns. (max 70%)

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Necessary Gluttony
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon consuming food, greatly increases health recovery.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each second, 10% of consumed calories are restored as health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 5 seconds.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Crack the Jackpot\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing an NPC in the head the fountain of money emerges from it.\n %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Phantom Pacifist
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Become invisible to anybody for 5 minutes.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]You can't draw a weapon, talk to anybody or interact with anything.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Chakram
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The artefact is a powerful throwing weapon.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]It will seek nearby foes and deal laceration damage upon contact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has the ability to ricochet of the walls and the objects.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]After some time or if its too far away, it will return to the wielder.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Normally has 2 uses, denoted by the condition of the artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Move the artefact to grenade slot manually or Right Click-Engage on it and then throw it like a grenade.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Friend of the Night
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Gives bleeding cure, speed and jump increase from 21 to 5 o'clock at any weather.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Decreases sleepiness at night, increases sleepiness at day.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Godzilla is Approaching
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Restores batteries charge of items while sprinting.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Won't revive completely dead batteries or devices with no batteries.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]More than 1 artefact increase sprinting speed.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]The Nutcracker
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Amplifies player's mighty foot and allows him to kick more mutants, resulting in instant death.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each artefact on the belt allows kicking more monsters.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 2 seconds with 1 artefact, increases with more artefacts on belt by 1 second with each artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Press USE key when near a mutant and in line of sight to perform a kick
 
 %c[d_orange]Mutant tiers: 
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 1 artefact: %c[ui_gray_3]Cats, Dogs, Tushkano, Zombies, Fractures.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 2 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Boars, Flesh, Pseudodogs, Bloodsuckers, Snorks, Lurkers.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 3 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Burers, Controllers, Poltergeists.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - 4 artefacts: %c[ui_gray_3]Chimeras, Pseudogiants.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Enlightening Kleptomania
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The artefact catches frequencies of packages and sends energy to light them up.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Lights up stashes and items emitting signal to RF-receiver.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The light is very dim and hardly visible at day, so searching at night is advisable.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Stunner
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stuns nearest monster inside 3 meters radius.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Also, getting melee hit by monsters or stalkers will make them stunned.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Affected enemy will be stunned for 3 seconds.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]While being stunned the enemy is disabled in fight and won't attack.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has a cooldown of 6 seconds between uses.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Getting hurt by yourself (for example, falling down from a height) will result in artefact discharge. Don't hurt yourself and stay safe.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Culinary Hyperversity
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Convert energy of raw mutant meat to special effects.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Effect lasts for 1 minute, eating different mutant meat overrides previous effect.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.
 
 %c[d_orange]Effects: 
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Flesh meat: %c[ui_gray_3]3%/sec health regen, 33% bullet damage penalty.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Boar meat: %c[ui_gray_3]50% bullet and wound damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Dog meat: %c[ui_gray_3]strong bleeding cure, 1%/sec psy regen.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Pseudodog: %c[ui_gray_3]3%/sec psy regen, 50% psy damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Bloodsucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until shooting or hitting enemy, very strong bleeding cure.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Psysucker: %c[ui_gray_3]become invisible until shooting or hitting enemy, 8%/sec psy regen.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Snork: %c[ui_gray_3]50% radiation damage reduction, 10%/sec stamina regen, 10msv/sec radiation cure, big satiety decrease.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Chimera: %c[ui_gray_3]8%/sec health regen, 15%/sec stamina regen, 33% raditation damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Lurker: %c[ui_gray_3]66% chem/fire/electric anomaly damage reduction.
 %c[0,192,71,221] - Tushkano: %c[ui_gray_3]30% speed increase, 20% melee damage penalty.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Rain of Revival. 
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon receiving a fatal blow, the artefact is destroyed and player is revived.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]50% of health is restored, all debuffs are healed and 5 seconds of immunity are granted.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The current weapon is dropped and the vision is screwed up.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Crank High Voltage
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]50% protection against electric anomalies.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stepping on Electra will fully recharge player's batteries of active devices.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Recharges random amount of devices and batteries combined in the inventory.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Empowers the artefact and activates special ability for 10 minutes.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Sometimes the pleasure of fresh charge is too big to handle, making you scream a bit more excited than usual and doubling the duration of special ability.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Does not stack.
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]SPECIAL ABILITY: %c[d_orange]Power-Up Massacre
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Grants infinite sprint and bonus to speed movement.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Upon shooting the weapon, the artefact increases its charge, resulting in increasing fire rate and additional movement speed.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Slower to shoot guns provide stronger charge.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]When not shooting, artefact will gradually lose it charge.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Bloodlust
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]30% increase of melee damage.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]50% increase of melee attack speed.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Vampire effect: 5% of new melee damage is converted to player's health.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Adds 5 seconds boost to player's speed after every hit.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Upon killing certain mutants spawns raw chunk of meat near them.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Stacks with multiple artefacts.

%c[0,209,172,56]PERK: %c[d_orange]Good ol' Ultra-Violence
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Your gun receives the possibility to trigger explosion shot.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]The first shot that hits the enemy will make it violently explode.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Explosion spawn meaty gibs and hurts everyone in the radius.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]User's discretion is advised.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]If you are lucky, you can hit helicopter's pilot and engage the artefact.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Has 2 minutes cooldown.
 %c[0,81,63,22] • %c[0,209,172,56]Each additional artefact decrease the cooldown by 3 times.
 
 %c[0,209,172,56]SPECIAL ABILITY: %c[d_orange]Exploderball
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Right Click-Engage on the artefact to drop it and roll to the cursor position.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]While rolling, press Right Click to perform small jump.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Press Left Click to blow up the artefact.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]The artefact is consumed upon use.
 %c[0,192,71,221] • %c[ui_gray_3]Press Escape to cancel.
